# RESEARCH EXPERIENCE

**Young Lives** | _Oxford, UK_ | Research Consultant \hfill 2021 - ongoing

* Assisted with development and implementation of round 7 of  Young Lives survey of childhood poverty in four low- and middle-income countries. Travelled to Hyderabad, India and Addis Ababa, Ethiopia to deliver training to fieldwork supervisors and collect feedback from country teams on survey modules.

**Grupo De Análisis para el Desarrollo** | _Lima, Peru_ | Visiting Researcher \hfill Winter 2023

* Working with local researchers to evaluate the impacts of schooling reform on siblings' skill formation and time use. Assist/monitor ongoing data collection for round 7 of Young Lives.

**Queen Mary University London** | _London, UK_ | Research Assistant \hfill 2022

* Assisted in designing survey to measure child human capital and skills in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

**Young Lives** | _Oxford, UK_ | Research Assistant \hfill 2020 - 2021

* Developed dataset of matched spatial covariates, cleaning and validating respondent locations and matching to external spatial datasets. Conducted validation of socio-emotional measures included in previous surveys, assessing suitability and performance within adolescent samples.

**Office for National Statistics** | _Newport, UK_ | Statistical Research Officer \hfill 2019

* Co-authored statistical bulletins, produced annual statistical tables and fulfilled data requests as part of the Mortality Statistics Unit.

**Health Economics Research Unit** | _Aberdeen, UK_ | Research Intern \hfill 2018

* Provided research assistance for studies on health technology and social prescribing to improve the clinical- and cost-effectiveness of health care in Scotland.
